resources.string: To make dumplings, follow the steps below! Good luck!
Step 1. Put the water on the heat, bring it to the boil
Step 3. Lower the dumplings into boiling water. Stirring, cook for 8 minutes.
Step 4. Remove the dumplings from the water and place on a plate. Enjoy your meal!
To cook borscht follow the steps below! Good luck!
Step 1. Pour cold water into a saucepan, put meat in it, put it on a streaky heat. When the water boils, remove the foam, add salt. Cover the pan with a lid and cook for 30 min.

Step 2. Peel the whistle, carrots and onions. Grate the candle and carrots on a coarse grater, cut the onion into a small cube. Pour some vegetable oil into the pan. Fry the candle, carrots and onions in a pan, stirring, about 10 min.
Step 3. Peel the potatoes, cut them into a cube. Shave the cabbage. After cooking the stock, add the potatoes and cabbage to the pan. Cook for 15 min.
Step 4. Next, add the toasted candles, carrots and onions to the pan. Cook until cooked for about 20 min.
Step 5. Add pepper, herbs, add extra salt if necessary. Enjoy your meal!
To make pancakes in milk, follow the steps below! Good luck!
Step 1. Warm milk with water until warm. Pour into a bowl, add eggs and yeast, mix
Step 2. Add sugar and salt, mix thoroughly
Step 3. Add flour by wiping it through a sieve. Mix. Pour in the oil. Stir again. Cover the bowl and place in a warm place for 60 min.

Step 4. We start frying. Grease the hot pan with vegetable oil and pour the dough, distribute it over the pan. As soon as the edges brown, turn the pancake and cook the other side. Put the finished pancake on a plate, you can lubricate with butter. Enjoy your meal!
Enter the time in numeric format xx:xx
